title: my friend's account is gone
body:
Riot, i have a friend in school playing league, he  just reach lv 30 a week ago, and one day i play with him and there is a guy name "jetpackbrat", my friend said to me this guy add him as friend and sand him some weird code, after that day 2/ 20 / 2017, my friend can never login anymore. i tried to help him login with another computer, but it was useless, it said that the username or password is incorrect. since he cant login i have to type for him using my account. my friend doesnt want to use a smurf since he took so long to get to lv 30 and he purches rp. please help riot.


my friend's username : **REDACTED**

his summornor name : Mengduo DY

replies.body:
I had to redact the username since it's sensitive account info that could further harm the security of the account. If you have your friend reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), we'll be happy to assist in sorting the account out.

Let me know if they run into any issues submitting their ticket.
but he frogot his email, what can he do?
He only needs access to a working email address, then to submit a ticket using the link I provided above. ^.^

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1W0cpJOI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-24T02:43:17.352+0000)
>
> I had to redact the username since it's sensitive account info that could further harm the security of the account

Just as an FYI, you guys don't even **_TELL_** people that summoner name and username aren't the same thing until they log into the game, so like 90% of people's first accounts are going to have these 2 things match.

You might want to fix that.

By having "Username" and "Summoner Name" **_BOTH_** on the sign up webpage. Just like every other game in existence that does this. (Usually with a note that "Summoner Name" is what people will see, and "Username" is not)
